publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-186.1 Mr John Swinney: Memorandum of Understanding—As an amendment to motion (S1M-186) in the name of Donald Dewar, leave out from "endorses" to end and insert "calls upon the Scottish Executive to re-negotiate the Memorandum of Understanding and supplementary agreements concluded between the United Kingdom Government, Scottish Ministers and the National Assembly of Wales in order to protect the interests of the Scottish people and ensure that no additional constraints are placed on the powers of the Scottish Parliament." Supported by: Alex Neil*, Mr Alex Salmond*
